name: Push-Up
instructions: Start in a high plank with hands slightly wider than shoulders.
Brace your core and keep a straight line from head to heels.
Lower until your chest nearly touches the ground.
Press through the floor to return to the plank.

name: Bodyweight Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly out.
Push hips back and bend knees to sit into a squat.
Keep chest lifted and weight in heels.
Drive through heels to stand tall.

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.
Step forward and lower until both knees are at 90 degrees.
Push through the front heel to stand and step forward with the other leg.
Continue alternating legs while keeping your torso upright.

name: Forearm Plank
instructions: Place forearms on the floor with elbows under shoulders.
Extend legs behind and balance on toes.
Keep body in a straight line and squeeze glutes.
Hold while breathing steadily without dropping hips.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Press arms into the ground for stability.
Drive through heels to lift hips until your body forms a straight line.
Lower hips with control and repeat.

name: Mountain Climber
instructions: Start in a high plank with shoulders over wrists.
Drive one knee toward chest while keeping hips low.
Switch legs quickly in a running motion.
Maintain a steady rhythm and stable upper body.

name: Burpee
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Squat down, place hands on floor, and jump feet back to a plank.
Jump feet forward to hands and explode up reaching overhead.
Land softly and immediately move into the next rep.

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench with the opposite foot on floor.
Hold a dumbbell with the free hand and let it hang toward the floor.
Pull the weight toward ribcage, squeezing shoulder blade back.
Lower with control and repeat before switching sides.

name: Jumping Jack
instructions: Stand tall with arms by your sides and feet together.
Jump feet out while raising arms overhead.
Quickly reverse to the starting position.
Stay light on your feet and maintain a brisk pace.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back with hands behind head and legs lifted.
Bring right elbow toward left knee while extending right leg.
Switch sides in a pedaling motion, rotating through torso.
Keep lower back pressed into the floor.

name: Bench Tricep Dip
instructions: Sit on the edge of a bench with hands gripping beside hips.
Walk feet forward and extend legs, supporting weight on arms.
Lower body by bending elbows until upper arms are parallel to floor.
Press back up to straighten arms without locking elbows.

name: Reverse Lunge
instructions: Stand tall with hands on hips or at sides.
Step one foot back and lower until both knees form 90-degree angles.
Keep front knee stacked over ankle.
Push through front heel to return and alternate legs.

name: High Knees
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart and arms at sides.
Run in place, driving knees toward chest.
Pump arms to match leg speed.
Maintain an upright posture and quick rhythm.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on your side with elbow under shoulder and legs stacked.
Lift hips off the floor to form a straight line from head to feet.
Keep core braced and hold position.
Repeat on the opposite side.

name: Plank Shoulder Tap
instructions: Start in a high plank with feet hip-width apart.
Lift one hand to tap the opposite shoulder while keeping hips stable.
Alternate sides, minimizing sway through the torso.
Keep glutes and core tight the entire time.

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, near a wall for balance if needed.
Rise onto the balls of your feet, squeezing calves.
Pause briefly at the top before lowering heels slowly.
Repeat without letting heels slam to the ground.

name: Jump Rope
instructions: Hold rope handles with elbows close to sides.
Swing rope overhead and jump as it passes under feet.
Land softly on balls of feet and keep a steady rhythm.
Maintain an upright posture and engage the core.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Brace core and press weights overhead until arms extend.
Lower weights back to starting position with control.
Avoid arching your lower back.

name: Renegade Row
instructions: Start in a plank with hands gripping dumbbells under shoulders.
Row one dumbbell toward ribcage while balancing on the other hand and feet.
Lower with control and switch sides.
Keep hips square and core tight throughout.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit on the floor with knees bent and heels lifted or anchored.
Hold a weight at chest level and lean back slightly.
Rotate torso to tap the weight beside hip, then switch sides.
Keep core braced and move in a controlled tempo.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Sit on the floor with shoulder blades against a bench and barbell across hips.
Plant feet shoulder-width apart.
Drive through heels to lift hips until torso is parallel to the floor.
Squeeze glutes at the top, then lower with control.
